attributes.action: allow breeders of puppies to band tails of puppies, in the same way that farmers are allowed to band tails of lambs.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As there is a proposed docking ban (the shortening of puppies tails by cutting),an alternative is to band the tails by using the same method that farmers are allowed to use in order to shorten lamb's tails.
Breeder's should be given permission to have the freedom of choice to perform this if they believe it will prevent future possibility of tail damage.This to apply to all currently traditionally docked breeds.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "allow breeders of puppies to band tails of puppies, in the same way that farmers are allowed to band tails of lambs."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
